title: Felicity Huffman takes a stroll in the LA sunshine as her prison sentence looms
text:
Former Desperate Housewives star Felicity Huffman enjoyed a hike in the LA sunshine with a friend on Thursday as her prison sentence looms.

The 56-year-old actress hit the walking trail wearing a wide-brimmed hat and work out gear.

The mother-of-two, who admitted to paying $15,000 to a fake charity to facilitate cheating on her daughter Sophia's SATs, is set to report to the Federal Correctional Institution in Dublin, California on October 25.

She will spend two weeks in prison as well as supervised release for one year, 250 hours of community service and a $30,000 fine for mail fraud and honest services mail fraud.

Sunshine stroll: Desperate Housewives star Felicity Huffman enjoyed a hike in the LA sunshine with a friend on Thursday

In a statement released after her sentencing, Huffman, who is married to fellow Hollywood star William H. Macy, said she has 'learned a lot about her flaws' following the scandal.

She said in a statement: 'I accept the court's decision today without reservation. I have always been prepared to accept whatever punishment Judge Talwani imposed. I broke the law. I have admitted that and I pleaded guilty to this crime. There are no excuses or justifications for my actions. Period.

'I would like to apologise again to my daughter, my husband, my family and the educational community for my actions. And I especially want to apologise to the students who work hard every day to get into college, and to their parents who make tremendous sacrifices supporting their children.

Support: The actress was joined on the outing by a friend

'I have learned a lot over the last six months about my flaws as a person. My goal now is to serve the sentence that the court has given me. I look forward to doing my community service hours and making a positive impact on my community. I also plan to continue making contributions wherever I can well after those service hours are completed.

'I can promise you that in the months and years to come that I will try and live a more honest life, serve as a better role model for my daughters and family and continue to contribute my time and energies wherever I am needed. My hope now is that my family, my friends and my community will forgive me for my actions.'

Huffman‘s daughter Sophia, 19, still wants to apply to universities and will be allowed to retake the SAT test, according to a new report.

Prison looms: Felicity will report to the Federal Correctional Institution in Dublin, California on October 25

The College Board — which administers the exam — has determined that there’s no evidence the teen knew her mother had an SAT exam proctor correct her wrong answers, TMZ reported earlier this month.

Huffman and Macy also have a 17-year-old daughter, Georgia.

Macy recently admitted Huffman's relationship with Sophia 'exploded' in the wake of the scandal, and revealed the family have been in therapy since the actress’s arrest.
description: Former Desperate Housewives star Felicity Huffman enjoyed a hike in the LA sunshine with a friend on Thursday as her prison sentence looms.
